description: This is an entry point source file for a React-based web application. It imports React, ReactDOM, a CSS stylesheet, and the main App component. It initializes the React app by rendering the App component inside a root DOM element, encapsulated within React's StrictMode for highlighting potential problems.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React element tree into the root DOM node.
